verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>: thou art to pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, to go in <S%H935><s%> to dispossess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than thyself <S%H5892><s%>, cities great <S%H1419><s%> and fortified up <S%H1219><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>,

a people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall <S%H7311><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakim <S%H6062><s%>, whom thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>, and of whom thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%> say <S%H3320><s%>, Who can stand before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>?

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day <S%H3117><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is he who goeth over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee as a devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>; he will destroy <S%H8045><s%> them <S%H3665><s%>, and he will bring them down before thee <S%H6440><s%>: so shalt thou drive them out <S%H3423><s%>, and make them to perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken unto thee <S%H1696><s%>.

Speak <S%H559><s%> not thou in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, after that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath thrust them out <S%H1920><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H559><s%>, saying, For my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath brought me in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> this land <S%H776><s%>; whereas for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before thee <S%H6440><s%>.

Not for thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, dost thou go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>; but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H6965><s%>, and that he may establish the word <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore <S%H3068><s%>, that Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee not this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it for thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>; for thou art a stiffnecked <S%H6203><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, forget <S%H7911><s%> thou not <S%H3068><s%>, how thou provokedst Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou wentest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, until ye came <S%H935><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>, ye have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Also in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> ye provoked <S%H7107><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with you to destroy you <S%H8045><s%>.

When I was gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> with you <S%H3427><s%>, then I abode in the mount <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; I did neither eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> unto me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; and on them was written according to all the words <S%H1697><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> with you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H6965><s%>, Arise, get thee down <S%H3381><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from hence <S%H5971><s%>; for thy people that thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves <S%H4118><s%>; they are quickly turned aside <S%H5493><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>; they have made them a molten image <S%H4541><s%>.

Furthermore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, and <S%H6203><s%>, behold, it is a stiffnecked people <S%H5971><s%>:

let me alone <S%H7503><s%>, that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> them <S%H4229><s%>, and blot out their name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of <S%H854><s%> thee a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater than they <S%H7227><s%>.

So I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and the mount <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in my two <S%H8147><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H2398><s%>, behold, ye had sinned against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; ye had made <S%H6213><s%> you a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>: ye had turned aside <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.

And I took <S%H8610><s%> hold of the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> them out of <S%H5921><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> them before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>, forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; I did neither eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>; because of all your sin <S%H2403><s%> which ye sinned <S%H2398><s%>, in doing <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%>.

For I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>, wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> against you to destroy <S%H8045><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>. But Jehovah hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto me that time also <S%H6471><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H599><s%> with Aaron <S%H175><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> him <S%H6419><s%>: and I prayed for Aaron <S%H175><s%> also at the same time <S%H6256><s%>.

And I took <S%H3947><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%>, the calf <S%H5695><s%> which ye had made <S%H6213><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>, and stamped <S%H3807><s%> it <S%H2912><s%>, grinding it very small <S%H3190><s%>, until it was as fine <S%H1854><s%> as dust <S%H6083><s%>: and I cast <S%H7993><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into the brook <S%H5158><s%> that descended out <S%H3381><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>.
And at Taberah <S%H8404><s%>, and at Massah <S%H4532><s%>, and at Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H6914><s%>, ye provoked Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%>.

And when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> you from Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H4784><s%>; then ye rebelled against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and ye believed <S%H539><s%> him not <S%H8085><s%>, nor hearkened to his voice <S%H6963><s%>.
Ye have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I knew you <S%H3045><s%>.

So I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%> that I fell down <S%H5307><s%>, because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would destroy you <S%H8045><s%>.

And I prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, destroy <S%H7843><s%> not thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, that thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> through thy greatness <S%H1433><s%>, that thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>, Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; look <S%H6437><s%> not unto the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, nor to their wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, nor to their sin <S%H2403><s%>,

lest the land <S%H776><s%> whence thou broughtest us out <S%H3318><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H8135><s%>, and because he hated them <S%H3318><s%>, he hath brought them out to slay <S%H4191><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

Yet they are thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou broughtest out <S%H3318><s%> by thy great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by thine outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>.
